div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1439 Asia Minor, 1968 Burial: c. 320 B.C. (M) Contents: 80+ AR Alexander III: lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 18, Sicyon 1, Tarsus 7, Salamis 4, Citium 1, Ama- thus 1, Myriandrus 6, Aradus 17, Byblus 2, Ace 5, Babylon 18) Disposition: dispersed Latest date at Ace yr. 24 (= 323/2 B.C.)
